data.description: An OO interface to the NoChex apc
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Provides an OO interface to the NoChex apc system that allows
    autmatic notification of payments received on your NoChex account to
    be registered on a server.

    Similar in function to Business::PayPal, but for the largely UK
    based NoChex system.
